text: National Wrestling Alliance (NWA) is an American professional wrestling promotion operating via its parent company Lightning One, Inc. Title reigns are either determined by professional wrestling matches or are awarded to a wrestler, as a result of the culmination of various scripted storylines. The promotion currently has 5 championships. The list includes the number of times the wrestler has held the title, the date and location of the win, and a description of the winning bout. ==Current champions== Championship Current champion(s) Current champion(s) Reign Date won Days held Location Notes NWA Worlds Heavyweight Championship Nick Aldis 2 October 21, 2018 Nashville, TN Defeated previous champion Cody at NWA 70th Anniversary Show. NWA World Women's Championship Serena Deeb 1 October 27, 2020 Long Beach, CA Defeated previous champion Thunder Rosa at UWN Primetime Live. NWA World Television Championship Elijah Burke 1 October 20, 2020 Los Angeles, CA Defeated previous champion Zicky Dice on UWN Primetime Live. NWA World Tag Team Championship Aron Stevens and JR Kratos 1 November 10, 2020 Long Beach, CA Defeated previous champions Eli Drake and James Storm on UWN Primetime Live. NWA National Championship Trevor Murdoch 1 September 29, 2020 Long Beach, CA Defeated previous champion Aron Stevens at an UWN Primtime Live pay- per-view. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official NWA website * Official NWA YouTube channel * Official NWA Facebook page Category:Lists of professional wrestlers
title: List of current champions in the National Wrestling Alliance
